Create a makeshift shelter using natural materials such as leaves, branches, and grass. This will provide you with protection from the sun, wind, and rain.
Wear a waterproof jacket made from plastic bags or other waterproof materials. This will keep you dry in case of rain or snow.
Use a piece of clothing to make a makeshift sun hat. This will help protect your face and neck from the sun's harmful rays.
Use a scarf or piece of fabric to make a bandana to protect your face from the wind and dust.
Use a piece of clothing to make a makeshift raincoat. This can be done by tying the sleeves and bottom of the shirt or pants together to create a protective covering.
